data.trigger: After you cover an ally with the Guard action
data.description:
That ally recovers an amount of Mind Points equal to 【10 + (the number of filled sections in your Brainwave Clock, multiplied by 5)】. If that ally is your focus, they heal from a single status effect of their choice out of dazed, enraged, and shaken.

Cost: @LOSS[max(5, (&cs('brainwave-clock')*5)) mp]{Psychic Gift}
Ally Recovers: @GAIN[10+(&cs('brainwave-clock')*5) mp]{Reassuring Presence}
Progress: @CLOCK[brainwave-clock update 1]{Advance Brainwave Clock}
